short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Littlecow Chrome Extension, get paid for browsing the web!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get paid for surfing the web! Install this Chrome Extension, accumulate cow points by surfing the web and redeem them for ETH tokens at the end of the month.
